title: Booking Buses
description: Buses offer excellent connectivity to places where trains don't reach and are a popular choice for overnight journeys and budget travel.
sentences: Use reliable platforms like RedBus or AbhiBus to book tickets and check reviews for different bus operators.
Choose your bus type carefully: AC/Non-AC, Sleeper/Semi-Sleeper, based on your comfort and budget.
Check the bus's live tracking link, if provided, on the day of your journey.
Be very sure about the exact boarding point, as there can be multiple pickup locations in a city.
Ratings and reviews for a specific bus operator are very important.
dos: Select seats in the middle of the bus for a more comfortable and less bumpy ride.
Keep your digital or physical ticket and a valid ID ready for inspection.
Reach your boarding point at least 15-20 minutes before the scheduled time.
Keep a light jacket or shawl handy as AC buses can get very cold overnight.
donts: Don't book from unknown or unrated bus operators to save a small amount of money.
Don't expect government buses to be as punctual or comfortable as private operators.
Don't keep any valuables in the luggage that goes into the bus's storage compartment.
Don't rely on the bus stopping at clean or hygienic restaurants for breaks; carry snacks.
